name: Fat Chicken
description: Fat Chicken is a REVERSE TOWER DEFENSE game where you fatten up farm animals for slaughter by pumping them full of hormones, overfeeding them and basting them with antibiotics to keep them alive so they're worth more when you turn 'em into tasty, tasty packaged meat...it's what's for dinner!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista Processor: 1.8 GHz CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 video card with shader 2 support and 512MB of VRAM Storage: 1700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 or later Processor: Dual core 2.0 GHz CPU or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10/11 video card with shader 3 support and 1GB VRAM or better Storage: 1700 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game is just broken, just trying to finish the tutorials i had multiple bugs preventing me from actually progressing through the game and finishing the tutorials properly.
10/10 trailer made me hungry for chicken wings. Would watch again.
